name: 张文才
description: 一个充满激情的软件工程师
bio_1: I'm aliased as Leo at work.
bio_2: I'm a learner, builder, and freedom seeker.
bio_3: I live in Ha Noi, Viet Nam.
bio_4: I was born in the beautiful Moc Chau plateau.
bio_5: My first programming language I learned was Pascal.
bio_7: I'm focusing on building eCommerce software.
bio_8: I work mostly with JS/TS technologies.
bio_16: I love playing video games, PES is my favorite one.
bio_start_coding: 我自 2016 年初开始学习编码，并深深沉迷其中。
bio_first_job: 我在 2016 年末找到了第一份工作，担任前端开发工程师。
bio_passion: 我对 JS/TS 全栈、Web 开发充满热情。
bio_blog_purpose: 我开始写这个博客是为了记录和分享我的知识和经验。
lost_message: Hmm.. it seems that you're lost
return_message: But don't worry, you can find plenty of other things on my homepage.

blog.intro: I write mostly about web development, tech related, and sometime about my personal life. Use the search below to filter by title.
